tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First of all i would like to thank Dr.sarbari Gupta for guiding us in the right direction regarding my son's health issue. He has been having persitant coug and cold and at night he couldn't sleep properly because of cold. After trying out various medications like nebulization and steaming nothing seems to work. The cold seems to go away but starts again during the night especially in cold season. So I was referred to this dr through my neighbour and she immediately suggested seeing an ENT specialist for this as his problem is only in the nose and not lungs. She said we can give temporary medicines which will solve the issue temporally but the real solution is with ENT specialist who can address it more clearly. For us luckily we went to Caveliar hospital Dr.Srinivasa and he gave the right medicine and now my son is completely fine.he asked to come after a month for review. Now my son's cold has come down.

So I strongly recommend the above dr. She is not only friendly but gives good guidance.

The doctor patiently heard the problem, and had followup queries to understand it better. She did not jump to medications, and rather focused on healthy eating habits, focus on nutrition etc. Finally the medicines recommended was for SoS basis only. Overall a pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Have been visiting Dr Sarbari from quite a while.. my kids love to visit her.. if they fall sick then they will be eagerly looking forward to visit ma'am.. she guides us precisely.. listens to our concerns patiently. After meeting her our worries fly away . Thank you so much ma'am.

review:
The services that we received from the hospital is excellent. Dr. Sarbari Gupta and the staff are friendly and ensure that we are properly informed about our baby's health and care. I would have no qualms in recommending them to relatives and friends. Dr. Sarbari Gupta was a wonderful pediatrician, she has not only taken great care of our baby's health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It's rare to find a doctor that combines such person touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I would like to thank the hospital management as well for warm and  welcoming environment, friendly and helpful staff. Fantastic service delivered by all.

Thank you
Ramya .A

review:
The doctor was good. Reception staff are very rude and not helpful at all. They didn't inform us about the cost and made us do a nebulization for our child at the hospital. We bought the mask and the medicine and they still charged us for it. Which they should have informed. We could have done it at home. 
Over all i feel it's a cash making place. I personally would not recommend it.

The ovum reception is very unfriendly and not at all helpful. They were adamant on their own process not explaining the journey. Moving other patients before the people who have taken appointment. At the appointed time the doctor was not present.
I have been visiting Dr. Sarbari for last 7 years for my daughter and can only offer words of appreciation and gratitude for being patient and her explanation.
